# `polars expr-not` for [expression](/commands/categories/expression.md)

<div class='command-title'>Creates a not expression.</div>

## Signature

```> polars expr-not {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Creates a not expression
```nu
> (polars col a) > 2) | polars expr-not

```
